result.execSummary:
All charges against Donte Lawrence Miller in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Donte Lawrence Miller is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donte Lawrence Miller

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court with attorney Nicholas M Weege.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for Jury Trial.  First call: Defense is ready to proceed. State is unable to proceed for reasons set forth in the record. On defense motion, Court orders case DISMISSED.
Justice Point Pretrial Services SUPERVISION Report received and filed.
JusticePoint Status Report, filed.

Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court with attorney Nicholas M Weege.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte Lawrence Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for final pre-trial. Final pretrial conference held.  Parties remain in trial posture. Jury trial remains scheduled on 7/06/2022 in Branch 30.
Defendant Motion in Limine, filed.
Defendant Witness List, filed.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 6.1.2022, filed.
State's Jury Instructions, filed.
State's Motion in Limine, filed.
State's Witness List, filed.
Justice Point Violation (Missed Alternate Contact) Report received and filed.
JusticePoint Status Report, filed.

Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court with attorney Nicholas M Weege.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte Lawrence Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Signed Order appointing counsel received and filed

Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court with attorney Christin Marie Saint Pierre.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte Lawrence Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Counsel informed Court there has been a breakdown in communication.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court.  Indigency hearing proceeded.  Based upon the defendant's statements, the court found the defendant eligible for appointment of counsel at county expense.  The court appointed Attorney Nicholas Weege to represent the defendant; counsel to be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant to repay Milwaukee County for attorney fees at the rate of $25.00 per month beginning on 5/1/2022 and then the 1st of each month there after.  Failure to make timely payments according to the imposed payment schedule may result in a civil judgment, subject to tax intercept. Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Received and Filed. Motion to Withdraw

Defense counsel emailed the Court that they are unable to appear at the next Court date.  Case moved from 2/22/2022 at 2:30 pm to 2/17/2022 at 9:00 am.  Parties notified via email.  Defendant mailed Notice of Hearing.
Status conference on February 17, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on February 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte Lawrence Miller appeared by video means.  
Indigency hearing proceeded.  Based upon the defendant's statements, the court found the defendant eligible for appointment of counsel at county expense.  The court appointed Attorney Christin Saint Pierre to represent the defendant; counsel to be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant to repay Milwaukee County for attorney fees at the rate of $25.00 per month beginning on 04/01/2022  and then the 1st of each month there after.  Failure to make timely payments according to the imposed payment schedule may result in a civil judgment, subject to tax intercept. Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense signed and filed. Case remains calendared in Br. 30.   This case will be heard via Zoom.   This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1 Zoom meeting information provided to parties. Status conference scheduled for February 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Justice Point Violation Report received and filed.  Report forwarded to Judge for review.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Court ordered no contact with A.T.M.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in court with attorney Angel L Johnson.  Defendant Donte Lawrence Miller in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte Lawrence Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
